title: Even it's the original HTML, It doesn't show the Format.
content: Even it's the original HTML, It doesn't show the Format from the Excel. and receiving email also I cannot see any format.
creator: sunyin93

title: Import of folder within Mail to Thunderbox.
content: I wish to import a folder from within my old Mail into my current Thunderbox. Is this possible, and how might it be done?
creator: whillans

title: recovering deleted message from mbox file
content:
Hi,

I deleted some messages from my imap mail (using the web interface, not TB) and want to recover them from the locally stored mbox files. On several places, I read that messages are not deleted but merely marked deleted via an X-Mozilla-Status: 0009 flag. I checked the mbox-file and the deleted messages are there, but the X-Mozilla-Status is 0001. But they don't show up in TB. Has there been a recent change to this?
creator: bob.ansay

title: Errore ricezione posta dopo cambio password
content: Dopo il cambio password dell'account di @libero.it thunderbird non riceve più la posta. Ho impostato la nuova password ma esce sempre l'errore "Non riuscito l’invio della password per l’utente geom.bicchi@libero.it. Il server di posta popmail.libero.it ha risposto: [AUTH] IOL RBL"
creator: silvano.bicchi
